Roadmap

Topics covered in this chapter include:
  • Compilers vs Interpreters
  • The Receiver as Argument
  • Inherited Methods
    • The problem of Multiple Inheritance
  • Overridden Methods
    • Name Encoding
  • Dispatch Tables
  • Bytecode Interpreters
  • Just in Time Compilation
